mapper.sql: select DocID, DocName, RelativePath, AttachToType, RelatedID, DocType from BAS_Doc
mapper.insert: insert into BAS_Doc (DocName, RelativePath, AttachToType, RelatedID, DocType) values ( #{docname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relativepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachtotype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relatedid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update BAS_Doc set DocName = #{docname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RelativePath = #{relativepath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AttachToType = #{attachtotype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RelatedID = #{relatedid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DocType = #{doctype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DocID = #{docid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
